mapper.select: select book_trade.trade_no, member.mem_name, book_trade.trade_title, book_trade.trade_book_title, book_trade.trade_publisher, book_trade.trade_price, book_trade.trade_condition, book_trade.trade_content, book_trade.trade_state FROM book_trade join member on book_trade.mem_no = member.mem_no WHERE 1=1 and book_trade.mem_no = #{mem_no} and book_trade.use_flag = 'Y'
mapper.update: update book_trade set use_flag = 'N', mod_date = now() WHERE 1=1 and mem_no = #{mem_no} and trade_no = #{trade_no}
